document.full_text: sony has finally agreed to testify before a congressional hearing regarding the massive data breach that occurred last month on sony's playstation network and jeopardized millions of customers personal information.
document.title: sony and epsilon agree to testify before congress
lines_and_colors: sony has finally agreed to testify before a congressional hearing regarding the massive data breach that occurred last month on sony's playstation network and jeopardized millions of customers personal information.
